activities: Providing reseller online backup services to companies throughout the world. We maintain all data in-house. No data is sold or used in outside parties whatsoever. All data stored on our systems from all customers is stored in an encrypted manner, and only accessible by the client who has the encryption key. No encryption keys or passwords are stored in any reversible form. We have absolutely no access to a customer's data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All data usernames/passwords/customer data/computer information is automatically processed, and displayed only to the owner.
privacyprograms: We do not disclose any data to any third-parties. All data is used in-house for reporting purposes as part of the service to our clients.
